snippet: A 16-year-old boy with a shotgun at a Central California high school shot a fellow student on Thursday; he was taken into custody after staff members talked him into putting down the gun.
abstract: California law enforcement officials say a 16-year-old boy with shotgun shot a fellow student at Taft High School in Kern County, and was taken into custody after staff members talked him into putting down the gun.
lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old boy with a shotgun at a Central California high school shot a fellow student on Thursday; he was taken into custody after staff members talked him into putting down the gun.

headline.main: California: Teenager Held in Shooting at High School
headline.print_headline: California: Teenager Held In Shooting at High School
